quotes: other Timorese, who are supposed to pick up the work [later on], send them to the proper school.
So that in four or five years you have a pool from which you can pull from and the Diaspora community can go home.
it is only two or three years. Meanwhile, I take those who are willing to stay in the public service and I send them to school

organizations.name: UN
quotes: Who else could the UN have hired? Was there an alternative?

organizations.name: Ministry of Finance
quotes: I am doing it for my Ministry of Finance as a pilot project, and I am convincing my donors to do it.

roles.title: accountants
quotes: Train accountants. Train macroeconomists. Train them properly.

roles.title: macroeconomists
quotes: Train accountants. Train macroeconomists. Train them properly.

I am bringing in Timorese that are more capable. But the capable Timorese demand more money, so I say ok I will pay it, but it is a project; it is only two or three years. Meanwhile, I take those who are willing to stay in the public service and I send them to school and this is the kind of model I am now trying to implement in Timor.
